shapes3d.utils

Class MeshSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.utils.MeshSection

  • public class MeshSection
extends Object
    Utility class to specify which part of the mesh to be drawn.
    Only applies to classes that inherit from Mesh2DCore i.e. BezierShape, Ellipsoid, Helix, Tube and Toroid.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

      MeshSection(int ewSteps, int nsSteps)
      Create a mesh section based on number of steps.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setRange(float ewStart, float ewEnd, float nsStart, float nsEnd)
      All parameters will be capped to the range >=0 and <= 1 and where necessary swapped so start < end position
      void setRange(int ewStartPiece, int ewEndPiece, int nsStartPiece, int nsEndPiece)
      All parameters will be capped to the range >=0 and < ewPieces / nsPieces and where necessary swapped so start < end position
      String toString()
